name: codesentinel-ai
description: Multi-agent AI code review with self-correction, security scanning, BYOK support, and universal model compatibility (Gemini, Ollama, OpenAI, DeepSeek-R1)

commands.title: CodeSentinel: Migrate Settings to Secure Storage

codeSentinel.apiKey.markdownDescription:
**[Optional]** Your personal Gemini API Key. Get yours at [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey).

**Security:** Keys are stored in VS Code's encrypted SecretStorage.

codeSentinel.modelProvider.markdownDescription:
**AI Model Provider**

- `gemini`: Always use Google Gemini (requires API key)
- `ollama`: Always use local Ollama (offline, free)
- `auto`: Try Gemini first, fallback to Ollama on failure

**Recommended:** `auto` for best experience

codeSentinel.enableStreaming.description: Enable real-time streaming responses for better UX

codeSentinel.applyFixesDirectly.markdownDescription:
**Apply Fixes Immediately**

When enabled:
- ‚úÖ Fixes are applied instantly without confirmation
- ‚ö° Faster workflow
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Can be undone with Ctrl+Z

codeSentinel.confidenceThreshold.markdownDescription:
**Self-Correction Trigger** (0-100)

If AI confidence is below this value, automatically trigger Validator Agent for second-pass review.

- **60-70**: Aggressive re-analysis
- **80-90**: Balanced (recommended)
- **95+**: Only very uncertain cases

codeSentinel.enableSecurityAgent.markdownDescription:
**Enable Security Agent**

Scans for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities:
- SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF
- Hardcoded secrets
- Authentication flaws
- Insecure crypto

codeSentinel.enableValidatorAgent.description: Enable Validator Agent for self-correction loops

codeSentinel.maxRetries.description: Maximum API retry attempts on failure

codeSentinel.debugMode.markdownDescription:
**Debug Mode** (Perfect for demos & judging)

Shows:
- Model provider used
- Latency metrics
- Token usage
- Agent iterations
- Confidence scores

codeSentinel.displayMode.description: How to display review results (webview = rich UI, markdown = simple)
